data.text: @DulwichCleanAir We can't see how anyone who lives, has a business or uses a boundary road can sensibly vote for candidates who so blatantly disregard your quality of life, and that of children at the schools?. See this Tweet. Who would advocate for this at schools? They didn't. Gaslighting https://t.co/SZc7FKAPVC

Astonishing representatives with such a blatant disregard for residents, businesses and schoolchildren on main roads. EDG has been a huge casualty of the LTNs, 2800 extra cars on EDG East, extra 500 at ED South @raghavparkash @dwnconservative  @JamesVBarber
@VotethemoutMay An LTN beneficiary who lobbied for his own road closure and when he succeeded, deleted the evidence https://t.co/7qrlk7UwWL

@VotethemoutMay If it's a hellhole, then he made it so. And to not defend a road that he represents is unforgivable. Is he really expecting people who live, work and commute along EDG to now vote for him?
